AnalystsTest.Text:
3/2/2013 3:08:39 PM
Write briefly about yourself before you proceed with the Test Topic. 
 

My name is Renigunta Praveen. I did my graduation from Osmania University, total i do have three years of experience into non voice process.

Coming to my experience, worked as a Process Associate in Google under the payrolls of Kelly Services Pvt. Ltd. for 8 months. Reason for leaving is that process got windupped. Before that i worked as a Officer in HDFC Bank Pvt Ltd for 30 months.

My hobbies are Listening to music and Playing cricket.

About my family, my father is busimess man, my mother is house wife and my married elder brother is working as a steno.



Does India hold the potential to become next Economic Superpower? Elaborate with facts.

India is become next Economic Superpower.

India is inviting and establishing so many companies and industries in India to reduce the unemployment.

Inventing the new technology products in the markets.

Day by day technology inproving for those technology things are made easy.

Exporting the Indian products to many of the coutries all over the world.

Researching the markets and going according to that so that.

So many well educated persons are there to maintain the Indian Economy.
